dimension: 10 1/8 x 4 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. (25.7 x 10.8 x 10.8 cm) (overall without rope)
title: Gourd with Stopper
description: hollow gourd with rope and leather wrapped around center; carved wooden stopper of figure with arms bent in opposite directions and beads (red, yellow, orange) wrapped around waist and neck
